title: pArukkullE nalla nAdu
sahitya: pArukkuLLE nalla nADu engaL bhArata nADucaraNam 1 jnAnattilE para mOnattilE uyar mAnattilE anna dAnattilE gAnattilE amudAga nirainda kavitaiyilE uyar nADu indap-   caraNam 2  dhIrattilE paDai vIrattilE nenjil IrattilE upakArattilEsArattilE mighu shAttiram kaNDu taruvadilE uyar nADu indap-   caraNam 3  nanmaiyilE uDal vanmaiyilE shelvap-panmaiyilE marat-tanmaiyilEpon mayilottiDu mAdartam karppin pugazhinilE uyar nADu indap-   caraNam 4  AkkattilE tozhil UkkattilE puya vIkkattilE uyar nOkkattilEkAkkat-tiral koNDa mallartam shenaik-kaDalinilE uyar nADu indap-   caraNam 5  vaNmaiyilE ulAt-tiNmaiyilE manat-tanmaiyilE mati nuNmaiyilEuNmaiyilE tavarAda pulavar uNarvinilE uyar nADu indap-   caraNam 6  yAgattilE tava vEgattilE tani yOgattilE pala bhOgattilEAgattilE deiva bhati koNDAr tam aruLinilE uyar nADu indap-   caraNam 7  ATRinile shunayUTrinilE tenral kATrinilE malaip-pETrinilEETrinilE payan IndiDunkAli inattinilE uyar nADu indap-    caraNam 8  tETTattilE marak-kUTTattilE kani ITTattilE payir UTTattilEtETTattilE aDangAda nadiyin shirappinilE uyar nADu indap-
